data_doc: Contains strings from listings files, with the HTML stripped out. Once the HTML has been stripped, the next stop is to extract data from these strings.

listings.category: The category to which this listing belongs.
listings.dat: The date on which this listing was scraped.
listings.price: The recorded price of this listing.
listings.reviews: All the reviews which were left.
listings.ships_from: The location this item ships from.
listings.ships_to: The location this item ships to.
listings.table_doc: Each row corresponds to a single listing page, on the date it was scraped. (That is, each listing should have more than one row, corresponding to different dates.)
listings.title: The name of this listing.
listings.url: The stem of the url at which this listing was found.
listings.vendor: The name of the vendor offering this listing
